channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Los Angeles homeowners begin to rebuild after devastating wildfires
item.description: Nearly four months after wildfires reduced thousands of Los Angeles-area homes to rubble and ash, some residents are starting to rebuild.

item.title: US Forest Service starts clearing homeless camp in Oregon national forest
Illinois landlord faces sentencing for hate crime, murder of a 6-year-old Palestinian American boy
